meanings.definition: A person who seeks to make a profit, especially through unethical or unfair means.
meanings.sent1: The profiteers took advantage of the situation to make money.
meanings.sent2: The profiteers were exploiting the vulnerable for their own gain.
meanings.sent3: The profiteers tried to sell sand in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The profiteers were like vultures preying on the unsuspecting.
meanings.sent5: The image of profiteers evokes greed and dishonesty.

meanings.definition: To make a profit, especially through unethical or unfair means.
meanings.sent1: Some businesses profiteer by overcharging their customers.
meanings.sent2: He decided to profiteer by cutting corners on safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The company tried to profiteer by selling expired products.
meanings.sent4: Profiteering in times of crisis is morally wrong.
meanings.sent5: Profiteering off people's misfortunes is despicable behavior.
